slow

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x40
Size:
0x4
Source:
output.rdl

Description

Example for a register that performs a slow task. Write '1' to 'flag' to start the task. This bit will be cleared automatically once the task is done and the register is ready to process more data.

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:17] - - - -
[16] flag rw 0x0 -
[15:0] input rw - -

Field Descriptions

flag

write '1' to start operation

input

input data of the operations
